ygData.subject: Re: AE AND PB
ygData.msgSnippet: Book says that PB is player based
ygData.messageBody:
Book says that PB is player based


At 11:55 PM 4/18/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Bill Long <bill@...>
>
>PB is Point Blank... it hits everything right next to you.
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Neil Lambert [mailto:smartass@...]
>Sent: Sunday, April 18, 1999 2:11 PM
>To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: AE AND PB
>
>
>From: "Neil Lambert" <smartass@...>
>
>i think AE is area effect... PB sounds like person based, i think you're
>right
>
